headline: Building A $100,000 Dividend Portfolio: Maximizing SCHD's Income With July's Top High-Yield Stocks
summary: SCHD underperformed the S&P 500 in 2025 but remains highly attractive due to its strong risk-reward profile and dividend growth potential. See more here.

headline: Altria Group, Inc. (MO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Altria Group, Inc. (MO) on Recital’s Substack by Anthony Yu. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MO. Altria Group, Inc. (MO)’s share was trading at $59.65 as of 3rd July. MO’s trailing and forward P/E were 10.01 and 11.12 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Altria’s Q1 […]
